TextView.android:text: 1. What is the value of 3 * (4 + 5) - 2?
2. If a shirt costs $20 and is on sale for 25% off, what is the sale price?
3. What is the next number in the sequence: 2, 5, 10, 17, 26, .....?
4. If 3x + 5 = 20, what is the value of x?
5. What is the square root of 144?
6. If a car travels at a constant speed of 60 miles per hour, how far will it travel in 3 hours?
7. What is 25% of 80?
8. If the perimeter of a rectangle is 30 cm and its length is 10 cm, what is its width?
9. What is the sum of the first 10 positive integers?
10. If 4x - 3 = 9, what is the value of x?
11. What is the volume of a cube with side length 3 cm?
12. If a store sells a shirt for $25 and makes a 20% profit, what is the cost of the shirt to the store?
13. What is 40% of 150?
14. If a rectangle has a length of 8 cm and a width of 6 cm, what is its area?
15. What is the next prime number after 17?
16. If 2/3 of a number is 12, what is the number?
17. What is the value of 2² + 3³?
18. If a triangle has side lengths of 5 cm, 6 cm, and 7 cm, what type of triangle is it?
19. What is 15% of 80?
20. What is the next number in the sequence: 1, 4, 9, 16, 25, .....?
